Uses of Package
com.hamweather.aeris.tiles

  • Packages that use com.hamweather.aeris.tiles 
    Package Description
    com.hamweather.aeris.maps  
    com.hamweather.aeris.maps.handlers  
    com.hamweather.aeris.tiles  
  • Classes in com.hamweather.aeris.tiles used by com.hamweather.aeris.maps 
    Class and Description
    AerisAnimationInfo
    Animation info returned from animation load task
    AerisPointData
    Aeris point enum that helps setup each loading with the proper aeris query, proper handler and proper legend.
    AerisTile
    Constants for different types of tile map overlays
    LoadTileAnimationTask.LoadTileCallback
    Interface for handling the callback of the tile loading.
    LoadTileAnimationTask.LoadTileProgressBar
    Interface to pass to the LoadTileAnimationTask.withProgress(LoadTileProgressBar).
  • Classes in com.hamweather.aeris.tiles used by com.hamweather.aeris.maps.handlers 
    Class and Description
    AerisPointData
    Aeris point enum that helps setup each loading with the proper aeris query, proper handler and proper legend.
  • Classes in com.hamweather.aeris.tiles used by com.hamweather.aeris.tiles 
    Class and Description
    AerisAnimationInfo
    Animation info returned from animation load task
    AerisPointData
    Aeris point enum that helps setup each loading with the proper aeris query, proper handler and proper legend.
    AerisTile
    Constants for different types of tile map overlays
    AerisTileProvider
    Handles adding tiles layers using the Aeris API to grab tiles with the associated mapview.
    BuildTileURL
    Builds a url to grab a tile from a specific time, code and section of a weather map.
    Day
    Day constant for the day codes.
    LoadTileAnimationTask
    Task to load the animation tiles for the current maps Latitude and longitude bounds.
    LoadTileAnimationTask.LoadTileCallback
    Interface for handling the callback of the tile loading.
    LoadTileAnimationTask.LoadTileProgressBar
    Interface to pass to the LoadTileAnimationTask.withProgress(LoadTileProgressBar).
    TileTimeInfo
    JSON wrapper for a file object received from Tile timestamp request
    TimeCodeResponse
    JSON wrapper for the time code response
